ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of potato soup
des: "A quick, hearty soup. Great on a wintry afternoon."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium heat, saut E the broccoli and onion in the butter or margarine, about 5 minutes, or until tender. Stir in the soup, milk, water, basil and pepper. Mix well and heat through, about 15 minutes. Add cheese and stir until melted.
